34namespace {

36constexpr webrtc::DataRate Interpolate(const webrtc::DataRate& a,
37 const webrtc::DataRate& b,
38 float rate) {
39 return a * (1.0 - rate) + b * rate;
40}
41
42constexpr char kUseLegacySimulcastLayerLimitFieldTrial[] =
43 "WebRTC-LegacySimulcastLayerLimit";
44
45constexpr double kDefaultMaxRoundupRate = 0.1;
46
47// TODO(webrtc:12415): Flip this to a kill switch when this feature launches.
48bool EnableLowresBitrateInterpolation(
49 const webrtc::WebRtcKeyValueConfig& trials) {
50 return absl::StartsWith(
51 trials.Lookup("WebRTC-LowresSimulcastBitrateInterpolation"), "Enabled");
52}
53
54// Limits for legacy conference screensharing mode. Currently used for the
55// lower of the two simulcast streams.
56constexpr webrtc::DataRate kScreenshareDefaultTl0Bitrate =
57 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(200);
58constexpr webrtc::DataRate kScreenshareDefaultTl1Bitrate =
59 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(1000);
60
61// Min/max bitrate for the higher one of the two simulcast stream used for
62// screen content.
63constexpr webrtc::DataRate kScreenshareHighStreamMinBitrate =
64 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(600);
65constexpr webrtc::DataRate kScreenshareHighStreamMaxBitrate =
66 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(1250);
67
68} // namespace
69
70struct SimulcastFormat {
71 int width;
72 int height;
73 // The maximum number of simulcast layers can be used for
74 // resolutions at |widthxheight| for legacy applications.
75 size_t max_layers;
76 // The maximum bitrate for encoding stream at |widthxheight|, when we are
77 // not sending the next higher spatial stream.
78 webrtc::DataRate max_bitrate;
79 // The target bitrate for encoding stream at |widthxheight|, when this layer
80 // is not the highest layer (i.e., when we are sending another higher spatial
81 // stream).
82 webrtc::DataRate target_bitrate;
83 // The minimum bitrate needed for encoding stream at |widthxheight|.
84 webrtc::DataRate min_bitrate;
85};
86
87// These tables describe from which resolution we can use how many
88// simulcast layers at what bitrates (maximum, target, and minimum).
89// Important!! Keep this table from high resolution to low resolution.
90constexpr const SimulcastFormat kSimulcastFormats[] = {
91 {1920, 1080, 3, webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(5000),
92 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(4000),
93 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(800)},
94 {1280, 720, 3, webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(2500),
95 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(2500),
96 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(600)},
97 {960, 540, 3, webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(1200),
98 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(1200),
99 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(350)},
100 {640, 360, 2, webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(700),
101 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(500),
102 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(150)},
103 {480, 270, 2, webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(450),
104 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(350),
105 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(150)},
106 {320, 180, 1, webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(200),
107 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(150),
108 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(30)},
109 // As the resolution goes down, interpolate the target and max bitrates down
110 // towards zero. The min bitrate is still limited at 30 kbps and the target
111 // and the max will be capped from below accordingly.
112 {0, 0, 1, webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(0),
113 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(0),
114 webrtc::DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(30)}};
115
116std::vector<SimulcastFormat> GetSimulcastFormats(
117 bool enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation) {
118 std::vector<SimulcastFormat> formats;
119 formats.insert(formats.begin(), std::begin(kSimulcastFormats),
120 std::end(kSimulcastFormats));
121 if (!enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation) {
122 RTC_CHECK_GE(formats.size(), 2u);
123 SimulcastFormat& format0x0 = formats[formats.size() - 1];
124 const SimulcastFormat& format_prev = formats[formats.size() - 2];
125 format0x0.max_bitrate = format_prev.max_bitrate;
126 format0x0.target_bitrate = format_prev.target_bitrate;
127 format0x0.min_bitrate = format_prev.min_bitrate;
128 }
129 return formats;
130}
131
132const int kMaxScreenshareSimulcastLayers = 2;
133
134// Multiway: Number of temporal layers for each simulcast stream.
135int DefaultNumberOfTemporalLayers(int simulcast_id,
136 bool screenshare,
137 const webrtc::WebRtcKeyValueConfig& trials) {
138 RTC_CHECK_GE(simulcast_id, 0);
139 RTC_CHECK_LT(simulcast_id, webrtc::kMaxSimulcastStreams);
140
141 const int kDefaultNumTemporalLayers = 3;
142 const int kDefaultNumScreenshareTemporalLayers = 2;
143 int default_num_temporal_layers = screenshare
144 ? kDefaultNumScreenshareTemporalLayers
145 : kDefaultNumTemporalLayers;
146
147 const std::string group_name =
148 screenshare ? trials.Lookup("WebRTC-VP8ScreenshareTemporalLayers")
149 : trials.Lookup("WebRTC-VP8ConferenceTemporalLayers");
150 if (group_name.empty())
151 return default_num_temporal_layers;
152
153 int num_temporal_layers = default_num_temporal_layers;
154 if (sscanf(group_name.c_str(), "%d", &num_temporal_layers) == 1 &&
155 num_temporal_layers > 0 &&
156 num_temporal_layers <= webrtc::kMaxTemporalStreams) {
157 return num_temporal_layers;
158 }
159
160 RTC_LOG(LS_WARNING) << "Attempt to set number of temporal layers to "
161 "incorrect value: "
162 << group_name;
163
164 return default_num_temporal_layers;
165}
166
167int FindSimulcastFormatIndex(int width,
168 int height,
169 bool enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation) {
170 RTC_DCHECK_GE(width, 0);
171 RTC_DCHECK_GE(height, 0);
172 const auto formats = GetSimulcastFormats(enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation);
173 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < formats.size(); ++i) {
174 if (width * height >= formats[i].width * formats[i].height) {
175 return i;
176 }
177 }
178 RTC_NOTREACHED();
179 return -1;
180}
181
182// Round size to nearest simulcast-friendly size.
183// Simulcast stream width and height must both be dividable by
184// |2 ^ (simulcast_layers - 1)|.
185int NormalizeSimulcastSize(int size, size_t simulcast_layers) {
186 int base2_exponent = static_cast<int>(simulcast_layers) - 1;
187 const absl::optional<int> experimental_base2_exponent =
188 webrtc::NormalizeSimulcastSizeExperiment::GetBase2Exponent();
189 if (experimental_base2_exponent &&
190 (size > (1 << *experimental_base2_exponent))) {
191 base2_exponent = *experimental_base2_exponent;
192 }
193 return ((size >> base2_exponent) << base2_exponent);
194}
195
196SimulcastFormat InterpolateSimulcastFormat(
197 int width,
198 int height,
199 absl::optional<double> max_roundup_rate,
200 bool enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation) {
201 const auto formats = GetSimulcastFormats(enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation);
202 const int index = FindSimulcastFormatIndex(
203 width, height, enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation);
204 if (index == 0)
205 return formats[index];
206 const int total_pixels_up =
207 formats[index - 1].width * formats[index - 1].height;
208 const int total_pixels_down = formats[index].width * formats[index].height;
209 const int total_pixels = width * height;
210 const float rate = (total_pixels_up - total_pixels) /
211 static_cast<float>(total_pixels_up - total_pixels_down);
212
213 // Use upper resolution if |rate| is below the configured threshold.
214 size_t max_layers = (rate < max_roundup_rate.value_or(kDefaultMaxRoundupRate))
215 ? formats[index - 1].max_layers
216 : formats[index].max_layers;
217 webrtc::DataRate max_bitrate = Interpolate(formats[index - 1].max_bitrate,
218 formats[index].max_bitrate, rate);
219 webrtc::DataRate target_bitrate = Interpolate(
220 formats[index - 1].target_bitrate, formats[index].target_bitrate, rate);
221 webrtc::DataRate min_bitrate = Interpolate(formats[index - 1].min_bitrate,
222 formats[index].min_bitrate, rate);
223
224 return {width, height, max_layers, max_bitrate, target_bitrate, min_bitrate};
225}
226
227SimulcastFormat InterpolateSimulcastFormat(
228 int width,
229 int height,
230 bool enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation) {
231 return InterpolateSimulcastFormat(width, height, absl::nullopt,
232 enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation);
233}
234
235webrtc::DataRate FindSimulcastMaxBitrate(
236 int width,
237 int height,
238 bool enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation) {
239 return InterpolateSimulcastFormat(width, height,
240 enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation)
241 .max_bitrate;
242}
243
244webrtc::DataRate FindSimulcastTargetBitrate(
245 int width,
246 int height,
247 bool enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation) {
248 return InterpolateSimulcastFormat(width, height,
249 enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation)
250 .target_bitrate;
251}
252
253webrtc::DataRate FindSimulcastMinBitrate(
254 int width,
255 int height,
256 bool enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation) {
257 return InterpolateSimulcastFormat(width, height,
258 enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation)
259 .min_bitrate;
260}
261
262void BoostMaxSimulcastLayer(webrtc::DataRate max_bitrate,
263 std::vector<webrtc::VideoStream>* layers) {
264 if (layers->empty())
265 return;
266
267 const webrtc::DataRate total_bitrate = GetTotalMaxBitrate(*layers);
268
269 // We're still not using all available bits.
270 if (total_bitrate < max_bitrate) {
271 // Spend additional bits to boost the max layer.
272 const webrtc::DataRate bitrate_left = max_bitrate - total_bitrate;
273 layers->back().max_bitrate_bps += bitrate_left.bps();
274 }
275}
276
277webrtc::DataRate GetTotalMaxBitrate(
278 const std::vector<webrtc::VideoStream>& layers) {
279 if (layers.empty())
280 return webrtc::DataRate::Zero();
281
282 int total_max_bitrate_bps = 0;
283 for (size_t s = 0; s < layers.size() - 1; ++s) {
284 total_max_bitrate_bps += layers[s].target_bitrate_bps;
285 }
286 total_max_bitrate_bps += layers.back().max_bitrate_bps;
287 return webrtc::DataRate::BitsPerSec(total_max_bitrate_bps);
288}
289
290size_t LimitSimulcastLayerCount(int width,
291 int height,
292 size_t need_layers,
293 size_t layer_count,
294 const webrtc::WebRtcKeyValueConfig& trials) {
295 if (!absl::StartsWith(trials.Lookup(kUseLegacySimulcastLayerLimitFieldTrial),
296 "Disabled")) {
297 // Max layers from one higher resolution in kSimulcastFormats will be used
298 // if the ratio (pixels_up - pixels) / (pixels_up - pixels_down) is less
299 // than configured |max_ratio|. pixels_down is the selected index in
300 // kSimulcastFormats based on pixels.
301 webrtc::FieldTrialOptional<double> max_ratio("max_ratio");
302 webrtc::ParseFieldTrial({&max_ratio},
303 trials.Lookup("WebRTC-SimulcastLayerLimitRoundUp"));
304
305 const bool enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation =
306 EnableLowresBitrateInterpolation(trials);
307 size_t adaptive_layer_count = std::max(
308 need_layers,
309 InterpolateSimulcastFormat(width, height, max_ratio.GetOptional(),
310 enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation)
311 .max_layers);
312 if (layer_count > adaptive_layer_count) {
313 RTC_LOG(LS_WARNING) << "Reducing simulcast layer count from "
314 << layer_count << " to " << adaptive_layer_count;
315 layer_count = adaptive_layer_count;
316 }
317 }
318 return layer_count;
319}
320
321std::vector<webrtc::VideoStream> GetSimulcastConfig(
322 size_t min_layers,
323 size_t max_layers,
324 int width,
325 int height,
326 double bitrate_priority,
327 int max_qp,
328 bool is_screenshare_with_conference_mode,
329 bool temporal_layers_supported,
330 const webrtc::WebRtcKeyValueConfig& trials) {
331 RTC_DCHECK_LE(min_layers, max_layers);
332 RTC_DCHECK(max_layers > 1 || is_screenshare_with_conference_mode);
333
334 const bool base_heavy_tl3_rate_alloc =
335 webrtc::RateControlSettings::ParseFromKeyValueConfig(&trials)
336 .Vp8BaseHeavyTl3RateAllocation();
337 if (is_screenshare_with_conference_mode) {
338 return GetScreenshareLayers(max_layers, width, height, bitrate_priority,
339 max_qp, temporal_layers_supported,
340 base_heavy_tl3_rate_alloc, trials);
341 } else {
342 // Some applications rely on the old behavior limiting the simulcast layer
343 // count based on the resolution automatically, which they can get through
344 // the WebRTC-LegacySimulcastLayerLimit field trial until they update.
345 max_layers =
346 LimitSimulcastLayerCount(width, height, min_layers, max_layers, trials);
347
348 return GetNormalSimulcastLayers(max_layers, width, height, bitrate_priority,
349 max_qp, temporal_layers_supported,
350 base_heavy_tl3_rate_alloc, trials);
351 }
352}
353
354std::vector<webrtc::VideoStream> GetNormalSimulcastLayers(
355 size_t layer_count,
356 int width,
357 int height,
358 double bitrate_priority,
359 int max_qp,
360 bool temporal_layers_supported,
361 bool base_heavy_tl3_rate_alloc,
362 const webrtc::WebRtcKeyValueConfig& trials) {
363 std::vector<webrtc::VideoStream> layers(layer_count);
364
365 const bool enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation =
366 EnableLowresBitrateInterpolation(trials);
367
368 // Format width and height has to be divisible by |2 ^ num_simulcast_layers -
369 // 1|.
370 width = NormalizeSimulcastSize(width, layer_count);
371 height = NormalizeSimulcastSize(height, layer_count);
372 // Add simulcast streams, from highest resolution (|s| = num_simulcast_layers
373 // -1) to lowest resolution at |s| = 0.
374 for (size_t s = layer_count - 1;; --s) {
375 layers[s].width = width;
376 layers[s].height = height;
377 // TODO(pbos): Fill actual temporal-layer bitrate thresholds.
378 layers[s].max_qp = max_qp;
379 layers[s].num_temporal_layers =
380 temporal_layers_supported
381 ? DefaultNumberOfTemporalLayers(s, false, trials)
382 : 1;
383 layers[s].max_bitrate_bps =
384 FindSimulcastMaxBitrate(width, height,
385 enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation)
386 .bps();
387 layers[s].target_bitrate_bps =
388 FindSimulcastTargetBitrate(width, height,
389 enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation)
390 .bps();
391 int num_temporal_layers = DefaultNumberOfTemporalLayers(s, false, trials);
392 if (s == 0) {
393 // If alternative temporal rate allocation is selected, adjust the
394 // bitrate of the lowest simulcast stream so that absolute bitrate for
395 // the base temporal layer matches the bitrate for the base temporal
396 // layer with the default 3 simulcast streams. Otherwise we risk a
397 // higher threshold for receiving a feed at all.
398 float rate_factor = 1.0;
399 if (num_temporal_layers == 3) {
400 if (base_heavy_tl3_rate_alloc) {
401 // Base heavy allocation increases TL0 bitrate from 40% to 60%.
402 rate_factor = 0.4 / 0.6;
403 }
404 } else {
405 rate_factor =
406 webrtc::SimulcastRateAllocator::GetTemporalRateAllocation(
407 3, 0, /*base_heavy_tl3_rate_alloc=*/false) /
408 webrtc::SimulcastRateAllocator::GetTemporalRateAllocation(
409 num_temporal_layers, 0, /*base_heavy_tl3_rate_alloc=*/false);
410 }
411
412 layers[s].max_bitrate_bps =
413 static_cast<int>(layers[s].max_bitrate_bps * rate_factor);
414 layers[s].target_bitrate_bps =
415 static_cast<int>(layers[s].target_bitrate_bps * rate_factor);
416 }
417 layers[s].min_bitrate_bps =
418 FindSimulcastMinBitrate(width, height,
419 enable_lowres_bitrate_interpolation)
420 .bps();
421
422 // Ensure consistency.
423 layers[s].max_bitrate_bps =
424 std::max(layers[s].min_bitrate_bps, layers[s].max_bitrate_bps);
425 layers[s].target_bitrate_bps =
426 std::max(layers[s].min_bitrate_bps, layers[s].target_bitrate_bps);
427
428 layers[s].max_framerate = kDefaultVideoMaxFramerate;
429
430 width /= 2;
431 height /= 2;
432
433 if (s == 0) {
434 break;
435 }
436 }
437 // Currently the relative bitrate priority of the sender is controlled by
438 // the value of the lowest VideoStream.
439 // TODO(bugs.webrtc.org/8630): The web specification describes being able to
440 // control relative bitrate for each individual simulcast layer, but this
441 // is currently just implemented per rtp sender.
442 layers[0].bitrate_priority = bitrate_priority;
443 return layers;
444}
445
446std::vector<webrtc::VideoStream> GetScreenshareLayers(
447 size_t max_layers,
448 int width,
449 int height,
450 double bitrate_priority,
451 int max_qp,
452 bool temporal_layers_supported,
453 bool base_heavy_tl3_rate_alloc,
454 const webrtc::WebRtcKeyValueConfig& trials) {
455 auto max_screenshare_layers = kMaxScreenshareSimulcastLayers;
456 size_t num_simulcast_layers =
457 std::min<int>(max_layers, max_screenshare_layers);
458
459 std::vector<webrtc::VideoStream> layers(num_simulcast_layers);
460 // For legacy screenshare in conference mode, tl0 and tl1 bitrates are
461 // piggybacked on the VideoCodec struct as target and max bitrates,
462 // respectively. See eg. webrtc::LibvpxVp8Encoder::SetRates().
463 layers[0].width = width;
464 layers[0].height = height;
465 layers[0].max_qp = max_qp;
466 layers[0].max_framerate = 5;
467 layers[0].min_bitrate_bps = webrtc::kDefaultMinVideoBitrateBps;
468 layers[0].target_bitrate_bps = kScreenshareDefaultTl0Bitrate.bps();
469 layers[0].max_bitrate_bps = kScreenshareDefaultTl1Bitrate.bps();
470 layers[0].num_temporal_layers = temporal_layers_supported ? 2 : 1;
471
472 // With simulcast enabled, add another spatial layer. This one will have a
473 // more normal layout, with the regular 3 temporal layer pattern and no fps
474 // restrictions. The base simulcast layer will still use legacy setup.
475 if (num_simulcast_layers == kMaxScreenshareSimulcastLayers) {
476 // Add optional upper simulcast layer.
477 const int num_temporal_layers =
478 DefaultNumberOfTemporalLayers(1, true, trials);
479 int max_bitrate_bps;
480 bool using_boosted_bitrate = false;
481 if (!temporal_layers_supported) {
482 // Set the max bitrate to where the base layer would have been if temporal
483 // layers were enabled.
484 max_bitrate_bps = static_cast<int>(
485 kScreenshareHighStreamMaxBitrate.bps() *
486 webrtc::SimulcastRateAllocator::GetTemporalRateAllocation(
487 num_temporal_layers, 0, base_heavy_tl3_rate_alloc));
488 } else if (DefaultNumberOfTemporalLayers(1, true, trials) != 3 ||
489 base_heavy_tl3_rate_alloc) {
490 // Experimental temporal layer mode used, use increased max bitrate.
491 max_bitrate_bps = kScreenshareHighStreamMaxBitrate.bps();
492 using_boosted_bitrate = true;
493 } else {
494 // Keep current bitrates with default 3tl/8 frame settings.
495 // Lowest temporal layers of a 3 layer setup will have 40% of the total
496 // bitrate allocation for that simulcast layer. Make sure the gap between
497 // the target of the lower simulcast layer and first temporal layer of the
498 // higher one is at most 2x the bitrate, so that upswitching is not
499 // hampered by stalled bitrate estimates.
500 max_bitrate_bps = 2 * ((layers[0].target_bitrate_bps * 10) / 4);
501 }
502
503 layers[1].width = width;
504 layers[1].height = height;
505 layers[1].max_qp = max_qp;
506 layers[1].max_framerate = kDefaultVideoMaxFramerate;
507 layers[1].num_temporal_layers =
508 temporal_layers_supported
509 ? DefaultNumberOfTemporalLayers(1, true, trials)
510 : 1;
511 layers[1].min_bitrate_bps = using_boosted_bitrate
512 ? kScreenshareHighStreamMinBitrate.bps()
513 : layers[0].target_bitrate_bps * 2;
514 layers[1].target_bitrate_bps = max_bitrate_bps;
515 layers[1].max_bitrate_bps = max_bitrate_bps;
516 }
517
518 // The bitrate priority currently implemented on a per-sender level, so we
519 // just set it for the first simulcast layer.
520 layers[0].bitrate_priority = bitrate_priority;
521 return layers;
522}

524} // namespace cricket
